gate.learning.learners
Class Paum

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.learners.SupervisedLearner
      gate.learning.learners.Paum

public class Paum
extends SupervisedLearner

The Java implementation of the PAUM learning algorithm, the Perceptron algorithm with uneven margins. See the following reference for more about the PAUM. Y. Li, H. Zaragoza, R. Herbrich, J. Shawe-Taylor, and J. Kandola. The Perceptron Algorithm with Uneven Margins. In Proceedings of the 9th International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML-2002), p379-386, 2002.
